DOC.brief_summary: Both regular exercise breakfast consumption well know health benefit . Consuming breakfast prior morning exercise may influence appetite , mood cognitive function later day . The purpose study test whether amount food consume breakfast prior exercise influence parameter active woman .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Breakfast Size Prior Morning Exercise Cognition , Mood Appetite Habitually Active Women
DOC.criteria: Must habitually active ( exercise least 30 minute , 3 time per week least previous 6 month ) Must normal exercise routine include minimum 1 morning exercise session ( take place 6am11am ) week Must run regular basis ( least per week ) able run moderate pace 30 minute nonstop treadmill Must consume breakfast day week , usually consume breakfast undertaking morning exercise session comfortable consume bowl cereal 45mins run English first language Smoking Previous current eating disorder , metabolic disorder , gastric problem contraindication exercise . Pregnancy The habitual use prescription counter medication ( exclude contraception ) herbal/dietary supplement ( please ask researcher ) A history current learning difficulty , ADHD dyslexia Daily use inhaler control asthma Allergies intolerance food provide study ( Special K cereal , semiskimmed milk , pasta , tomato sauce , cheese , olive oil , rice , custard )
